description: Verify that the test execution page loads correctly with proper authentication and test plan data
scenario: Admin user navigates to execute a specific test plan using the execution functionality
expected_results: Display the test execution page with test information, progress tracker, and result form
procedure:
1. Log in as admin user
2. Navigate to test plans list
3. Click execute button for an existing test plan
4. Verify page loads at /admin/system-test/test-plans/{id}/execute
5. Check header shows 'Execute Test Plan' with test plan number and module
6. Verify all sections are displayed: test information, procedure steps, and result form

description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the test execution functionality
scenario: Regular user attempts to access test execution functionality directly
expected_results: Access should be denied with 403 Forbidden error for non-admin users
procedure:
1. Log in as regular user (non-admin)
2. Attempt to navigate to /admin/system-test/test-plans/1/execute
3. Verify 403 Forbidden error is returned
4. Check redirect to appropriate error page
5. Ensure no test execution interface is accessible

description: Verify complete test execution workflow from navigation through result submission
scenario: Admin completes entire test execution workflow including progress tracking and result submission
expected_results: Complete workflow provides seamless test execution experience with proper tracking and feedback
procedure:
1. Navigate to execution from test plan view
2. Review test information and procedure steps
3. Begin test execution
4. Check off procedure steps as completed
5. Monitor progress bar and counter updates
6. Select test result status (Pass/Fail/Skip)
7. Provide failure reason if test failed
8. Submit result with confirmation
9. Verify redirect to test plan view with updated status and success message
10. Confirm all execution data is properly saved and displayed

description: Verify the page header displays correct execution context with test plan details
scenario: Admin views execution page header to understand which test plan is being executed
expected_results: Display header with 'Execute Test Plan' title and test plan number with module name
procedure:
1. Navigate to execute page for test plan STP-001-01
2. Check title shows 'Execute Test Plan'
3. Verify description shows test plan number and module name
4. Confirm 'Back to Test Plan' button navigates to view test plan page
5. Check proper styling and fade-in animation

description: Verify submit button is enabled only when test status is selected
scenario: Admin observes submit button state based on form completion
expected_results: Submit button is disabled initially and enabled when test status is selected
procedure:
1. Verify 'Submit Result' button is disabled initially
2. Select any test status (Pass, Fail, Skip)
3. Check submit button becomes enabled
4. Verify button shows save icon and proper text
5. Confirm button styling is appropriate
